Data Fields
EDMA_errorConfig_t_ Struct Reference

Error configuration for transfer controller, allows enabling/disabling of various error conditions. More...

#include <drivers/edma/edma.h>

Data Fields

bool isConfigAllEventQueues
 Set to true if want to configure all event queues.
 
uint8_t eventQueueId
 if isConfigAllEventQueues is false, used to specify the event queue to be configured.
 
bool isEventQueueThresholdingEnabled
 Set to true if want to enable event queue thresholding.
 
uint8_t eventQueueThreshold
 event Queue threshold, should be in the range [0, EDMA_EVENT_QUEUE_THRESHOLD_MAX], convenient defines in Event Queue Threshold Configuration Defines
 
bool isConfigAllTransferControllers
 Set to true if want to configure all transfer controllers.
 
uint8_t transferControllerId
 If isConfigAllTransferControllers is false, used to specify the transfer controler Id to be configured.
 
uint8_t isEnableAllTransferControllerErrors
 Set to true if want to enable all transfer controller errors, this is provided for convenience so as not to have to specific each error in transferControllerErrorConfig.
 
EDMA_transferControllerErrorConfig_t transferControllerErrorConfig
 If isEnableAllTransferControllerErrors is false, used to specify which errors to enable.
 
EDMA_errorCallbackFxn_t callbackFxn
 Call back function associated with CC errors.
 
edmaTransferControllerErrorCallbackFxn_t transferControllerCallbackFxn
 Call back function associated with queue/TC (Transfer Controller) errors.
 

Detailed Description

Error configuration for transfer controller, allows enabling/disabling of various error conditions.
